p: Based on the hydrodistillation analysis, the average content of peppermint EO in the microcapsules was of 0.96 ml per 10 grams of microcapsules, equal to 9.6% of EO in the microcapsules (v/w). The chemical composition of the analyzed peppermint EO was in general typical for this oil, with the main compounds being menthol and menthone, constituting together ~80% of the oil. However, the oil contained higher amounts of menthol and lacked limonene oxide, as compared to the European Pharmacopoeia [ 18] ( Table 1).
